title: base crate split into several translation units even with codegen-units=1

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
When building for example alacritty with
````toml
[profile.release]
lto = true
codegen-units=1
````
````
 RUSTFLAGS="-Z time-passes -Z time-llvm-passes" cargo build --release -j 1
````
it seems that the base crate is still split upinto several translation units (altough there is no parallelism while building it) which makes lto unnecessarily slow.
